com.plotsquared.iserver.crush.syntax

Class Syntax

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.plotsquared.iserver.crush.syntax.Syntax
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Comment, ForEachBlock, IfStatement, Include, MetaBlock, MetaBlockStatement, Variable

    public abstract class Syntax
extends java.lang.Object
    This is used to create Crush syntax such as {{variable.name}} or the foreach loop.

    This has to be registered by the server in order to be used
